SELECT

SELECT
FROM T_SHOP s LEFT JOIN T_COMPANY c ON c.ID = s.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN T_REGION r ON r.ID = s.REGION_ID LEFT JOIN T_SHOP_EXTENSION e ON s.ID = e.SHOP_ID LEFT JOIN T_SHOP_GRADE g ON s.GRADE_ID = g.ID LEFT JOIN T_ATTRIBUTE a1 ON e.RELATIONSHIP = a1.ID LEFT JOIN T_ATTRIBUTE a2 ON e.BIZ_CATEGORY = a2.ID LEFT JOIN T_ATTRIBUTE a3 ON s.BIZ_ID = a3.ID LEFT JOIN T_MATERIEL m ON m.ID = s.MATERIEL_ID WHERE s.ID = #{id}

SELECT count(1) AS totalcount FROM T_SHOP WHERE 1=1

SELECT p.ID,p.SHOP_ID,p.SHOP_NAME FROM T_SHOP p LEFT JOIN T_OPTION o ON p.SHOP_ID = o.OBJECT_ID LEFT JOIN T_USER_OPTION uo ON o.ID = uo.OPTION_ID LEFT JOIN T_USER u ON uo.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT ID,SHOP_ID,SHOP_NAME FROM T_SHOP WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}
SELECT COMPANY_ID,ID,SHOP_ID FROM T_SHOP WHERE SHOP_CODE=#{shopCode}
SELECT p.ID FROM T_SHOP p JOIN T_USER_SHOP us ON us.SHOP_ID = p.ID JOIN T_USER u ON u.ID = us.USER_ID WHERE p.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} AND p.REGION_ID IS NOT NULL AND u.ID = #{uid}

SELECT p.ID,p.SHOP_NAME,r.REGION_NAME AS CITY_NAME,cc.WERKS FROM T_SHOP p LEFT JOIN T_REGION r ON r.ID = p.REGION_ID LEFT JOIN T_CURRENCY cc ON cc.REGION_ID = r.PARENT_ID LEFT JOIN T_USER_SHOP us ON us.SHOP_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER u ON u.ID = us.USER_ID WHERE u.ID = #{userId} AND p.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} GROUP BY p.ID,p.SHOP_NAME,r.REGION_NAME,cc.WERKS LIMIT 1

SELECT p.ID,p.SHOP_NAME,r.REGION_NAME AS CITY_NAME,cc.WERKS FROM T_SHOP p LEFT JOIN T_REGION r ON r.ID = p.REGION_ID LEFT JOIN T_CURRENCY cc ON cc.REGION_ID = r.PARENT_ID LEFT JOIN T_USER_SHOP us ON us.SHOP_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER u ON u.ID = us.USER_ID WHERE u.ID = #{userId} AND p.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId} GROUP BY p.ID,p.SHOP_NAME,r.REGION_NAME,cc.WERKS

SELECT p.ID,p.SHOP_NAME,r.REGION_NAME as CITY_NAME,cc.WERKS,p.ADDRESS FROM T_SHOP p LEFT JOIN T_REGION r ON r.ID = p.REGION_ID LEFT JOIN T_CURRENCY cc ON cc.REGION_ID = r.PARENT_ID WHERE p.COMPANY_ID=#{companyId} AND p.ID IN (SELECT SHOP_ID FROM T_USER_SHOP WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ) GROUP BY p.ID,p.SHOP_NAME, r.REGION_NAME,cc.WERKS ORDER BY p.SHOP_NAME

SELECT s.*, g.GRADE_NAME AS gradeName, b.BIZ_NAME AS bizName, r.REGION_NAME AS countryName, e.REGION_NAME AS cityName FROM T_SHOP s LEFT JOIN T_SHOP_GRADE g ON s.GRADE_ID = g.ID LEFT JOIN T_SHOP_BIZ b ON s.BIZ_ID = b.ID LEFT JOIN T_REGION r ON s.PARENT_ID = r.ID LEFT JOIN T_REGION e ON s.REGION_ID = e.ID WHERE s.ID = #{shopId} AND s.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}

SELECT
FROM T_SHOP s LEFT JOIN T_COMPANY c ON c.ID = s.COMPANY_ID LEFT JOIN T_REGION r1 ON r1.ID = s.COUNTRY LEFT JOIN T_REGION r2 ON r2.ID = s.CITY LEFT JOIN T_SHOP_EXTENSION e ON s.ID = e.SHOP_ID LEFT JOIN T_SHOP_GRADE g ON s.GRADE_ID = g.ID LEFT JOIN T_ATTRIBUTE a1 ON s.RELATIONSHIP = a1.ID LEFT JOIN T_ATTRIBUTE a2 ON s.BIZ_CATEGORY = a2.ID LEFT JOIN T_ATTRIBUTE a3 ON s.BIZ_ID = a3.ID LEFT JOIN T_MATERIEL m ON m.ID = s.MATERIEL_ID WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY s.CREATE_DATE

SELECT s.SHOP_NAME, s.GRADE_ID, g.GRADE_NAME, g.SORT_INDEX, r.REGION_NAME AS cityName FROM T_SHOP s LEFT JOIN T_SHOP_GRADE g ON s.GRADE_ID = g.ID LEFT JOIN T_REGION r ON s.REGION_ID = r.ID WHERE s.ID = #{shopId} ORDER BY g.SORT_INDEX, s.SHOP_NAME

SELECT p.ID,p.SHOP_NAME,p.OPEN_DATE,p.PARENT_ID AS COUNTRY,c.REGION_NAME AS COUNTRY_NAME,p.REGION_ID AS CITY,r.REGION_NAME AS CITY_NAME,p.ADDRESS FROM T_SHOP p LEFT JOIN T_USER_SHOP up ON up.SHOP_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN T_REGION r ON r.ID = p.REGION_ID LEFT JOIN T_REGION c ON c.ID = r.PARENT_ID WHERE up.USER_ID = #{userId} AND p.STATUS = 1 ORDER BY p.OPEN_DATE DESC

SELECT p.ID, p.SHOP_NAME, p.COUNTRY,c.REGION_NAME AS COUNTY_NAME, p.CITY, r.REGION_NAME AS CITY_NAME, p.ADDRESS, p.OWNER_NAME, p.OWNER_PHONE, e.PROMOTER, e.SUPERVISOR, sm.MATERIEL_ID, m.NAME_CN,m.NAME_EN, p.GRADE_ID, g.GRADE_NAME, p.BIZ_ID, b.BIZ_NAME, e.SALE_TOTAL_QTY, e.SALE_BRANDSP_QTY,e.BRAND_ONE, e.BRAND_TWO, e.BRAND_THREE, p.REMARK FROM T_SHOP p LEFT JOIN T_REGION r ON r.ID = p.REGION_ID LEFT JOIN T_REGION c ON c.ID = r.PARENT_ID LEFT JOIN T_SHOP_EXTENSION e ON e.SHOP_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN T_SHOP_MATERIEL sm ON sm.SHOP_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN T_MATERIEL m ON m.ID = sm.MATERIEL_ID LEFT JOIN T_SHOP_GRADE g ON g.ID = p.GRADE_ID LEFT JOIN T_SHOP_BIZ b ON b.ID = p.BIZ_ID LEFT JOIN T_USER_SHOP up ON up.SHOP_ID = p.ID WHERE p.ID= #{id} AND USER_ID = #{userId}

mapper.select: SELECT p.ID, p.SHOP_ID, r.REGION_NAME AS CITY_NAME, p.SHOP_NAME, t.VISIT_DATE AS LASTVISIT_TIME FROM T_SHOP p LEFT JOIN T_USER_SHOP us ON us.SHOP_ID = p.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER u ON us.USER_ID = u.ID LEFT JOIN T_REGION r ON p.CITY = r.REGION_NAME LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(v.VISIT_DATE) AS VISIT_DATE, p.ID from T_VISIT v, T_SHOP p WHERE p.ID = v.SHOP_ID group by p.ID ) t ON t.ID = p.ID WHERE u.USER_ID = #{userId}
